How It Works

Outgoing SMS

We will be sending your SMS to different countries: UK, Latvia, Taiwan

Check if your mobile plan includes SMS outside of your country

We have a dynamic payout system. For some SMS we pay 0.5 Eurocents, for others up to 3 Eurocents

It depends on the access your mobile carrier has.

You must have access in order to use our app. To know if you have access we will run an access test

What is an access test?

If we receive any of your SMS during the access test ‚Äî you are welcome to use Cash4SMS.

If you see "Service unavailable" it means that we haven't received any SMS from you and you can't use our service at the moment. Try earning with Incoming SMS

Payments are made in the first week of every month

If the amount is more than ‚Ç¨5, then you can request an individual payment

Incoming SMS

What is incoming sms?

We will send you SMS with random text and numbers. If you receive these SMS. it means that the SMS channel is working perfectly fine on your end

What are they needed for?

Content providers and integrators need to test SMS channels all over the world and learn how stable are they

Turn on the Internet for incoming SMS

First of all‚òùÔ∏è Make sure your internet connection is active for the app to count all of the SMS that your phone received from us We

What about payment?

We will be paying 2 Eurocents for each SMS that you receive from us

Get money through PayPal

In order to receive your payment you need to fill in the PayPal form before you initiate the Incoming SMS. Follow the system's comments

Enable all permissions to read sms

In order to start receiving SMS and get paid you have to enable all the permissions to read SMS by Cash4SMS

Questions
& Answers

What is the main goal of Cash4SMS?

The main goal of Cash4SMS is to help mobile users get the most value out of their mobile plans by allowing them to sell their unused SMS messages.

Which mobile operating systems does Cash4SMS support?

At the moment, Cash4SMS supports all versions of the Android operating system above 5.0.

When can I withdraw my money?

We are making payouts by request when your balance is 5 euro or higher. In all other cases, we are transferring money right after the billing period. So, if you‚Äôve sent SMS in February, we will transfer your money to your PayPal account during the first week of March.

Is Cash4SMS safe to install it?

Absolutely! Cash4SMS is a completely safe cash reward app that cares about your security and privacy.

Do you have a Cash4SMS app for iPhone?

Unfortunately, due to iOS restrictions related to SMS sending Cash4SMS is available for Android devices only.

How can I get information about SMS included in my mobile bundle/tariff plan?

Please contact your mobile operator for this kind of information.

Which personal data do you collect while registering a new user?

You should provide your name, surname, phone number, date of birth, country (it will be automatically recognized by the App), you will add your payment details in the App Setting and you will be asked for your PayPal ID.
IMPORTANT!!! Please make sure that your name and surname provided during the initial registration fully match your PayPal account details.

Why does it say ‚ÄòService Unavailable‚Äô?

Our service is available in almost all countries all over the world. At the same time, there are still some mobile operators that are not connected and we are constantly working to cover all of them. If you see ‚ÄòService Unavailable‚Äô after passing the access test it means that currently your operator is not connected and you can‚Äôt use our service.

How do I get paid for the SMS i send?

At the moment we are transferring money right after the billing period. So, if you‚Äôve sent SMS in March, we will transfer your money to your PayPal account during the first week of April. However, if you reach the amount of 5 Euro you can just type Payout in the chat and we will make the money transfer within 1-2 business days. Don‚Äôt forget to fill in your PayPal info to get the money transfer.
